condition.details: Reupholstered. Wear consistent with age and use. Reupholstered in vintage fabric. Frame is in excellent condition with no defects.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: This exquisite solid oak post-modern Italian armchair is a true work of art, showcasing a meticulously hand-carved frame that exemplifies the finest craftsmanship. The sculptural design of the chair is a striking fusion of form and function, where the beauty of its craftsmanship is matched by its practicality and durability. Constructed from high-quality materials, this armchair is built to last a lifetime, offering both timeless elegance and long-term reliability. The reupholstery, completed in a luxurious vintage fabric, enhances the chair's visual appeal, while the back of the chair also features the same stunning fabric, ensuring that it remains captivating from every angle. A perfect representation of the Italian Post-Modern period, this piece embraces the era's characteristic blend of innovation, bold design, and artistic expression. The Post-Modern movement in Italy, particularly during the 1970s and 1980s, was marked by a departure from traditional design norms, blending geometric shapes, vibrant colors, and a playful reinterpretation of classical forms. This armchair encapsulates these qualities, making it not only a functional seating option but also a conversation starter and a piece of art in its own right.
